attributes.action: Cancel the reduction of the Army's arsenal by 100 tanks, and add one more armoured Division to the Army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already have too few tanks - only 386 (not to mention that the Second CFE Treaty allows us to have more tanks than that). Our army is overstretched. Yet the Defence Secretary said he'll reduce the Army's tank arsenal by 100. Please cancel that decision and please add one more Armoured Division to the Army, and name it the Welsh Division.
